Title: UI- Front End Developer
Description:
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
· Develop new user-facing features
· Build reusable code and libraries for future use
· Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
· Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
· Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
· Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
· Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS
· Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
· Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
· Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
· Good understanding of UI Library like Bootstrap
· Working knowledge of Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator or Corel Draw.
· Proficient understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
· Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
· Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹300,000.00 to ₹450,000.00 /year

web development: 1 year (Required)
total work: 1 year (Preferred)

Job Location: Bangalore
About Us
Morgan Stanley is a leading global financial services firm providing a wide range of investment banking, securities, investment management and wealth management services. We advise, originate, trade, manage and distribute capital for governments, institutions and individuals. As a market leader, the talent and passion of our people is critical to our success. Together, we share a common set of values rooted in integrity, excellence and strong team ethic. We provide you a superior foundation for building a professional career where you can learn, achieve and grow.

MS Wealth Management (MSWM) Technology
Morgan Stanley Wealth Management (MSWM) Technology is the global technology department responsible for the design, development, delivery and support of the technical solutions behind the products and services used by the Morgan Stanley Wealth Management (MSWM) business. The department is comprised of 10 organizations: Sales, Banking & Corporate-Client Technology, Investment Products & Markets Technology, Client Reporting, Core Processing, Private and International Wealth Management Technology, Technology Integration Office, Enterprise Infrastructure & Production Management, Capital Markets Application & Data Services, Deployment Planning & Release Management, and the Chief Operating Office.

Department Profile
Client Channels Technology is a dynamic and fast-paced area within the Firm’s WM Technology Division. The charter of this department is to develop Client-facing Websites and Mobile Applications. Working as a member of this team, the candidate will be responsible for developing and supporting external client facing web and mobile applications in an open and collaborative environment. If you are an exceptional

The Role
The UI team builds user interfaces that will run in responsive websites and hybrid mobile applications.
The candidate is expected to code, conduct code reviews, and test software as needed, working as part of a global agile team that comprises web application and web services developers.
Our UI tech stack includes the Angular framework, TypeScript, SCSS, RxJS, Adobe Analytics, and Cordova.
The candidate should be flexible and a self-motivated team player, committed to delivering on time.

QUALIFICATIONS
Skills Required
5+ years of experience building responsive websites
Excellent in JavaScript and CSS
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming
Attention to detail, with the ability to reproduce a visual design exactly using CSS and HTML
Strong communication skills and problem solving skills
Ability to take ownership of work streams, operates without close supervision, and work across the organization.
Skills Desired
Experience with Angular, TypeScript, and SCSS
Knowledge of responsive web development and accessibility, including WCAG 2.1 guidelines
Strong grasp of user experience
Experience with agile methodologies

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Frontend Developer responsible for the client side of our service. Your primary focus will be to implement a complete user interface in the form of a mobile and desktop web app, with a focus on performance. Your main duties will include creating modules and components and coupling them together into a functional app. You will work in a team with the back-end developer, and communicate with the API using standard methods. A thorough understanding of all of the components of our platform and infrastructure is required.
*
Responsibilities
Delivering a complete front end application
Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop
Writing tested, idiomatic, and documented JavaScript/jQuery, HTML, CSS and Ajax.
Coordinating the workflow between the graphic designer, the HTML coder, and yourself
Cooperating with the back-end developer in the process of building the RESTful API
Communicating with external web services
Skills
Proficiency with JavaScript/jQuery, HTML5 and CSS.
Deep knowledge of Javascript practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience
Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components
Ensuring a clear dependency chain, in regard to the app logic as well as the file system
Extensive knowledge of CSS and JS methods for providing performant visual effects and keeping the framerate above 30fps at all times
Validating user actions on the client side and providing responsive feedback
Writing non-blocking code, and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi-threading, when needed
*

Title: Wordpress Developer
Description:
About IDEX
Do you want to be part of a global movement for improving the quality of lives for people and significantly enhance your own life in the process?
Are you tired of dead-end jobs with even more “dead” (or constipated) people around yourself and you seek to make your life, your career and yourself matter?
Are you willing to be part of a team of “rebels” who, since 2003, have gone through successes, failures, mistakes and great victories to create a small but truly outstanding company that is daring to dream globally and already somewhat on its way?
If yes, then you may want to be part of our Tribe and get on the ride?
Through a journey of many ups and downs, we have created ( and are still creating) a company that has offered the very best travel experiences to people that money can buy. And in the process, have operations in 5 Asian countries (India, Thailand, Vietnam, Sri Lanka and Nepal) and have managed to create a global distribution network in 35 countries worldwide.
We have done this through creating a thriving business and following our values of always doing what is right, taking care of each other, doing more things with less and making continuous improvements.
Idex is not a place for the meek or even for those who have been brain-damaged to believe that only people formal education in some “top-notch” educational institutions can have amazing careers and worth in the world. Idex is not a place for those who are happy with the status-quo. Its only fit for those with ambitions. Ambitions for a great life for themselves and for making a difference in the world.
And while we are situated in the rather dull and boring city of Jaipur in India, our fan-base is global. And so are our ambitions.
We are committed to and making strong progress towards our 20-year goal to serve 5 million people annually and get there by continuously challenging ourselves for creating innovative service solutions, providing great value to our customers, elevating lives of our stakeholders, disrupting already existing ways of doing things and making an impact globally.

Knowledge of how to interact with RESTful APIs and formats (JSON, XML)
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools {{such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial}}
Strong understanding of PHP back-end development

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

Title: Drupal Front-end Developer RED
Description:
As an Axelerant Drupal Front-end Developer, you would be designing and implementing the look and feel of websites and related materials by creating sitemaps, wireframes, and visual design comps for internal and client-facing web projects. Additionally, you’ll design for multiple devices and interactions (such as desktops, touch devices like smartphones and tablets, and simpler devices like feature phones).
Responsibilities
Knowledge of web standards and technologies: Drupal theming, PHP, CSS, HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, etc.
Experience using front-end frameworks like AngularJS, ReactJS, Ember, Zurb Foundation, Bootstrap, and other grid systems.
Knowledge of CSS frameworks such as CSS, SASS, LESS, OOCSS, Smacss, BEM, etc.
Experience in application performance through JavaScript profiling and code optimization.
Experience with Git, using the terminal, and managing your front-end with package managers such as NPM and organization tools like Grunt.
An understanding of Drupal and using Drupal tools such as Drush and Composer.
Drupal 8 experience with Twig, theme suggestions, variable encoding on a page for JS, preprocessors desired.
Requirements
2+ years of front-end development experience
1+ year of Drupal front-end development experience
Excellent written and verbal English communication skills, with an ability to collaborate in a multi-time zone environment
Experience with Agile methodologies including Scrum or Kanban a plus
BS or MS in Computer Science or equivalent work experience
A desire to learn and adapt to new applications and frameworks, and enthusiasm for exciting and innovative technologies.
Commitment to delivering high-quality software on time.
Special Considerations
Though all of Axelerant’s roles are work from anywhere, we are India-based for salaries and work timings. Explicitly, we expect people to typically have at least a five-hour crossover with the 11 AM to 7 PM India (UTC+05:30) timezone workday.
About Axelerant
We began as an idea in 2005 to build a unique, work from anywhere professional services organization with empowering benefits for our team members. Today, we have achieved that and are continuously improving our career, feedback, performance, and recognition management programs. Further, leadership can happen by anyone, at any time from within Axelerant's team.
We're a very collaborative bunch of enthusiastic achievers who are being open about how we're doing it and kind to make people feel welcome in all that we do. So, when you're excited about learning from and helping others – you'll find a great home here.
Discover the Axelerant Difference
Axelerant is an open organization with fantastic team members and a rocking 4.8/5.0 Glassdoor rating. Our growing team of 100+ includes some of the best and brightest from around the world.
Remote & Flexible
All you need is a reliable Internet connection. Work from anywhere you're comfortable and choose work hours to balance your life.
Unique Culture
Our culture is distinctive. We do everything in our power to create an empowered and fulfilling work environment for team members.
Professional Development
We're always teaching and learning. Peer mentorship, life coaching, certifications, and training help our team members advance professionally.
International Events
We want you to attend events related to the things you care about. Get sponsored by us when you're contributing to those events.
Retreats & Meetups
With annual retreats, quarterly town halls, and monthly celebrations, we never let remote get in the way of work or fun.
Leave Policy
52 weekends and 35 days per year of consolidated leave plus maternity, paternity, and sabbatical allowances.

Title: Email Developer HTML
Description:
We are looking for a Responsive Email template Designer or Email Marketing Specialist for our Marketing team. This Email Template Developer will be responsible for all the email template building, coding, and testing of customer-centric email marketing campaigns that we execute various Marketing Automation and Email Sending Platforms (ESP) platforms. This professional will have expertise and years of experience in HTML and email marketing technologies to carry out the day-to-day responsibilities.

We work with US-based clients and you will be expected to be available during US pacific time zone (Night Shift).

Key Job Duties of the Web Designer / Responsive Email Template Developer will include:

He/she will be working with HTML Email Templates and designing web pages using HTML/CSS.
Daily working on Monitoring, Updating, or Fixing issues with Newsletter Layouts, Landing Page Templates, website pages.
WIll be working in building Tableless, Table, and Nested table layouts as and when those are required.
Will be creating and managing Responsive website design designs, email marketing messages, Newsletter templates and Landing Page templates.
Will be working in managing media queries for all types of Fluid and Responsive Builds which will be compatible with all the platforms and size of mobile and tablet devices.
He/she will be working for rendering fixes for email newsletters all sizes and all major platforms of desktop, mobile and web based email clients including Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo, AOL, all major platforms of browsers including Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, and web-based email clients including Outlook 2007-2013, Apple Mail etc..
Must be working toward implementing Marketo and other ESP platforms for designing, developing, coding and managing various types of email marketing campaigns such as, lead nurturing campaigns, email blasts and many other campaigns..
Will be working toward designing creatives for social marketing campaigns for diverse social platforms including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Linkedin and other platforms using marketing automation platforms
Will be working in designing and managing HTML and CSS of templates
Will rigorously follow client requirements in designing email and landing page templates and making changes to templates as per clients’ feedback
Will be working closely with teams to guarantee on-time delivery of all templates
Will be working toward delivering designing and developing of email marketing campaigns, converting to HTML, quality auditing of templates, and addressing requirements of revisions
Work with all marketing automation, ESP and CRM platforms to ascertain accuracy of all email templates and cross platform, device and browser compatibility of all templates
Will be involved in doing research to implement modern and best email practices in design, layout, development, and deliverability.
Will work in configuring email and landing page A/B testing practices.

Skills and expertise required for the role:

Should possess expertise in diverse Marketing Automation and ESP platforms including Marketo, Salesforce, Pardot, Eloqua etc.
Must possess working knowledge in Lead Life Cycle, Lead scoring, marketing analytics
Must possess expertise in Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Coral, Wordpress etc.
Must have experience to design, develop, and set up applications
Must have 3+ years of experience in Responsive email marketing design and web design
Must possess working experience in agency and client-side designing and development
Proven experience in implementing and optimizing CRM in email campaigns such as, campaign planning, segmentation, execution and evaluation
Possess demonstrated experience in IT skills in JavaScript, Sql and HTML CSS
Proven experience in working with Campaign Management Systems and Content Management Systems

Who are we?
Company Name: Marketing Demand Gen
Industry: Marketing Automation Consulting
Location: Located in India with client base in USA
Experience: 3 - 5 years
Qualification: Any Graduate MCA, BCA, BTech Computer Science, BSC IT, Msc IT

Title: Front End Developer Intern
Description:
About Comunev:
Comunev is a startup team, building Social Media 2.0- for the future.
We are bringing the next wave of change for the age-old Social Media by introducing an interest-based social network where you can meet, share and connect with like-minded people who understand you and your vibe. We bring people together and help them in making real-life connections through our online and offline communities based on different interests such as books, art, fitness, startup, etc. We do regular physical and virtual events for these communities.
We are building the future and its a big responsibility and we’d like to share a bit of that with you. We are looking for people who aim to play with the impossible. People who have the vision to dream big and the insane ability to work towards their goals. We know its hard to find such people, but we want to be a team of champions and if you feel you’re the right fit, join us!
About the Internship:
We build for ‘form’ and ‘function’ at Comunev. At this internship, you will get a chance to work with experienced developers and tech leads to build a platform from scratch. An opportunity to learn, test and to quickly grow your skills in making a complete web product.
Your responsibilities as a Frontend Development Intern would include-
Working on the website of Comunev
Collaborating with the tech team to plan the product
Designing and Coding the frontend
Learning from the tech mentors and others in the team
Building a product that is 10x better than any competitor
Understanding and Exploring the long term vision in product development
Up for the challenge? Make sure you have these too-
Determination- to constantly improve
Hunger- to learn a lot
Patience- to handle problems
Creativity- to stand out
Courage- to challenge the status quo
# of Internships available: 1
Skill(s) required: Web Development, Angular Development (AngularJS), UI Development, Advance Level HTML, Experience with AJAX, Basic Idea of DOM-based models
Only those candidates can apply who:
are available for full time (Work From Home) internship
can start the internship in 1 week
are available for a duration of 3+ months
have relevant skills and interests
and want to help people connect
Perks: Internship Certificate, Letter of Recommendation/Appreciation, Flexible work hours and dress code (Startup Culture) and Job Offer
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Internship, Fresher
Salary: ₹7,000.00 to ₹10,000.00 /month
COVID-19 considerations:
Our team is 100% remote so safety is natural plus you'll get to know how a remote team works.
Work Remotely:
Yes

Title: Full Stack Web Developer
Description:
Full stack developer
Salary: 5-10 LPA
Location: Mumbai
About ZenOnco.io:
ZenOnco.io is the world’s first integrative oncology healthtech platform. At ZenOnco.io, we aim to extend life and improve the quality of life for cancer patients through integrative oncology treatment, which covers both medical treatment as well as complementary treatment (Nutrition, emotional wellness, fitness, and community support).
To provide the best medical treatment options to cancer patients, we have partnered with 50+ hospitals across India, and cover 1,000+ oncologists. We also provide patients access to a full range of diagnostic tests that are required to arrive at the most effective cancer treatment.
We heavily deploy technology in our operations, and have recently launched the world’s first Integrative Oncology Preliminary Assessment Report tool (ZIOPAR) to guide cancer patients free of cost on the possible treatment options based on their cancer profile, symptoms and other conditions.
We believe in innovation, dedication and commitment. While we have the thrill to seek out and capture the world, we are looking for a responsible partner in you. If you feel you can become one of us, apply today.

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
The Frontend Developer has the main responsibility of producing, maintaining, and supporting the business’s web-based and software systems and platform.
Site/Software Development: Oversees frontend development for the business’s websites and platforms by building sitemaps, prototypes, wire frames, and conducting the documentation that articulates the sites’ structures and organization.
Implements any requested template, JavaScript, and CSS changes to the already existent websites.
Develops code using JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS on responsive sites across multiple browsers, tablets, and other internet accessing devices such as phones in order to ensure accessibility of the site from multiple devices.
Duty to build reusable code and libraries that may be used in future and reduce site building workload for the business.
User Experience/User Interface: Plays a leading role in the translation of the user interface/user experience design wireframes into actual code that produces visual elements of the website/software in progress.
Applying responsive user interface design principles and ensuring the technical feasibility of these user interface designs for the best user experience possible.
Troubleshooting and Testing: Tasked with defining, designing, and executing usability testing of sites/software.
Leading role in troubleshooting and fixing any frontend issues and tests the site/software for multi-device and cross-browser capability.
Responsible for evaluating site/software specs prior to their implementation in order to ensure retention of design simplicity and ease of navigation.
Reviews and coordinates feedback throughout the site/software development lifecycle where he ensures that all input is valid prior to submitting it to the backend team.
Collaboration - Works with the user interface department in designing and developing prototypes for usability testing of site and software features.
Highly imaginative and prolific
Exceptional out of the box thinking
Strong understanding in wireframe tools like Adobe XD, Balsamiq, Invision, Figma
Wizard in designing tools like Photoshop, InDesign, after effects, illustrator, and Corel draw

We are looking for a skilled React.js Developer to join our front-end development team. We are open to consider less experienced candidates who have the willingness to learn and are proactive.
In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux, Flux, and Webpack. You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase.
To ensure success as a React.js Developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript and React concepts, excellent front-end coding skills, and a good understanding of progressive web applications. Ultimately, a top-class React.js Developer should be able to design and build modern user interface components to enhance application performance.

Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.

Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
Documenting application changes and developing updates.

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a similar field.
Previous experience working as a React.js Developer.
In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML and front-end languages.
Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux.
Experience with user interface design.
Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
Excellent troubleshooting skills.
Good project management skills.

Title: Web Application Developer
Description:
Company Description

TRS, starting off as an OMR specialist three decades back, today, has transformed into India’s leading end-to-end solution provider in the examination vertical. Our commitment towards providing quality results to our clients, has helped us grow into what we are today.

Innovation is the strongest driving force for TRS and this has enabled us to consistently pioneer new solutions, thereby keeping ahead of the competition in this line of work. TRS is the sole Indian SME company in this niche sector to have a strong R&D team. In recent years, TRS has indigenously developed a diverse product portfolio and has registered for two patents.

Our solutions, over the years have permeated all over and today many of our ideas have been standardised and used by top educational boards/institutes across the country. One example is the usage of barcodes for dummy numbering in universities, which was introduced by TRS and today this method is being popularly followed all over India. Introducing OMR shading in the front page of booklets was also a TRS innovation, which has successfully helped improve the quality of result publication for many institutions.

The strong domain expertise coupled with high end R&D competence, gives TRS an edge over others. Ensuring high quality standards has always been a hallmark of TRS and this is clearly seen in the number of clients who have stayed on with us over the years and have adopted our solutions fruitfully.

With a committed team of expert personnel to handle high security work, the reputation of TRS has always been an ever rising curve. Keeping up to that, TRS aims to be in constant pursuit of transforming evaluation methods in the education sector, which in turn would help create high quality human capital for the future of our country.

Job Description

Technical knowledge in areas such as client-side components, server-side languages, web application frameworks and database management systems, Web security.

Qualifications

Qualification: Graduate in Computer Science

Skill set: Web Application Developer, Visual Studio .net 2010 or Higher, MVC, Javascript, CSS, .Net Frameworks, SQL Server 2010 or Higher

Hindi Typing skill

Experience: 2+Yrs

About the company:
As a company or an individual, one may be sitting on a billion-dollar idea or a requirement, which may change the world forever. However, a lack of understanding of the software industry derails the execution and in turn, fails a rather genius idea. Unaware of the perils of this complex industry, you end up burning a lot of cash and an even more resourceful thing - time. We are a team of Product Managers with experience of working with people with different industries with unique problems. We also possess all the skills, tools and knowledge of the processes required to convert the idea into a tech product and then sell this tech product to customers. Delivering the product faster and cheaper is a need of the hour and having an in-house team of Developers, Designers, Testers, Digital Marketers and Business developers gives us that leverage. Our Mission is to get things done!

Title: PHP Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a PHP Developer responsible for managing back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.
Responsibilities
· Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers
· Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules
· Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges
· Integration of data storage solutions, good knowledge of Amazon AWS server management.
· Create APIs for the various Apps that we develop and ensure smooth functioning of the Apps
Skills And Qualifications
· Strong knowledge of PHP web frameworks, such as Laravel, Yii, etc. Knowledge of Yii framework is a must
· Understanding the fully synchronous behavior of PHP
· Understanding of MVC design patterns
· Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
· Knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming
· Understanding accessibility and security compliance
· Strong knowledge of the common PHP or web server exploits and their solutions
· Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
· User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
· Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system
· Familiarity with limitations of PHP as a platform and its workarounds
· Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
· Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases and their declarative query languages
· Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
· Good understanding of WebRTC platform and its integration

PHP (Preferred)

Title: Front End Web Developer
Description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY
‘I AM IN’, which is an acronym of "I am investing", is a platform to Help Parents and Kids become money smart in an exciting way.
Our app focuses on the 6 most important quotients of Financial Literacy: Spend, Save, Donate, Invest, Earn & Learn.
1) Spend: Let the kid take a decision on their Expenses (inculcate smart spending)
2) Save: They Decide Goals and Save for them using various features of the Application
3) Donate: Doing their bit for the Society
4) Invest: Let Money grow Money and help them achieve their goals
5) Earn: Earn rewards from parents by completing the tasks given to them.
6) Learn: Teach kids about financial literacy by providing content applicable to their age group through Theories, Videos, Case studies of Investors, DIY Activities & much more.
Requirements
FRONT-END DEVELOPER
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.
- Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application.
- You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices
- Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS/JavaScript practices
- Make elegant and beautiful website according to the UI Designs in a matter of 2-3 days
- Integrate smooth and efficient animations in website
- Website should be mobile-responsive and quality of animations and visual effects should also be retained in mobile version
- Work with smooth scrolling, animations linked with scrolling and parts of graphic assets, story-line kind of website
- Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
- Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs
- Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our product
- Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities
- Cooperate with graphic designers to match visual design intent
QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS:
- Must be proficient/expert in CSS and JavaScript
- Proven working experience in frontend development
- Top-notch programming skills and in-depth knowledge of modern HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- A solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management, and best development practices
- Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem-solving skills
- Strong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelines and budgets with business acumen
- Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment, learn rapidly, and master diverse web technologies and techniques.
BENEFITS
You should join us if you want to be part of a mission-driven company. If you believe that financial literacy is a life-changing skill then help us spread the awareness. Join us and make yourself part of this amazing journey.
Perks
1. Competitive Salary
2. Flexible work-hours
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹300,000.00 to ₹600,000.00 /year
Experience:
Programming / HTML: 1 year (Required)
total work: 1 year (Required)
CSS: 1 year (Required)
javascript: 1 year (Required)
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: Front End Developer - Angular
Description:
About the Company:
ISchoolConnect is an online platform that makes the University Admissions process hassle-free, fun and accessible to students around the globe. Using our unique AI technology, we allow students to apply to multiple universities with a single application. iSchoolConnect also connects with institutions worldwide and aids them in the transformation of their end-to-end admission processes using our various cutting-edge use cases. Our technologies include the Conversational AI chatbot, Document Grader, Video Interview Analyzer, and a Single application use case which aids institutions with International Enrollment Management.
Job Description:
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
iSchoolConnect's Mission:
To make International Education and University Admissions process hassle-free, fun and accessible to students around the globe
For more information visit: https://ischoolconnect.com/
LinkedIn Page: https://www.linkedin.com/company/ischoolconnect/
Responsibilities:
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills and Qualifications:
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Good understanding of at least one of advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks such as AngularJS, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, ReactJS etc.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools Git.
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them. * Ability to work in a dynamic environment using agile methodologies
Good to Have:
Knowledge on NodeJS will be an added advantage.
Knowledge of working on Cloud technologies like Google cloud platform/ AWS

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Company Description
We have a core set of technologies we work with on a daily basis - the ones we know are scalable, dependant and forward thinking. We always lead with these.
We will however always work with customers regardless of their existing tech stack or on going requirements.

Job Description
We are looking for a UI/UX Designer to turn our software into easy-to-use products for our clients.
UI/UX Designer responsibilities include gathering user requirements, designing graphic elements and building navigation components. To be successful in this role, you should have experience with design software and wireframe tools. If you also have a portfolio of professional design projects that includes work with web/mobile applications, we’d like to meet you.
Ultimately, you’ll create both functional and appealing features that address our clients’ needs and help us grow our customer base.
Responsibilities
Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineers
Illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows and sitemaps
Design graphic user interface elements, like menus, tabs and widgets
Build page navigation buttons and search fields
Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look like
Create original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)
Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders
Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)
Conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback
Adhere to style standards on fonts, colors and images

Qualifications
Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role
Portfolio of design projects
Knowledge of wireframe tools (e.g. Wireframe.cc and InVision)
Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop
Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders
Good time-management skills
Minimum 1 year of working experience
BSC/MCA/BE in computer science, IT
Additional Information
We believe that delivering product is worthless unless it’s successful. We work with our clients to ensure what we ship results in happy customers.

Title: Full Stack Web Developer
Description:
We at Rethink UX are looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to work with our current team of full-stack developers and help us in building our software products.
*
You’ll be part of a cross-functional team that’s responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.
If you always wanted to be part of a team that respects your ideas, always pumps you up to grow, and has a knack of building finely crafted software that can disrupt entire industries then this job is the chance for you to prove yourself.
As part of RethinkUX, you’ll also be working closely with development and business teams to create market-driven applications. This is a unique opportunity for the right candidate to help us deliver the next generation of software products.
Roles and Responsibilities
Design the overall architecture of web applications.
Designing Database Schema.
Collaborate with our current team to design and launch new features in our products.
Designing and developing REST APIs.
Maintain the quality of the code and ensure the source code is well documented and easy to manage.
Deployment of applications on AWS.
Obsessive attention to minute details when it comes to implementing UI of the application or keeping source code clean.
Implementation of security and data protection.
And, very important staying abreast of developments in web applications and overall technology so that you don't get obsolete.
Basic Qualifications
The ideal candidate should have the following skills and experience:
Proven experience as a Full Stack Web Developer or similar role for more than a year.
Have a knack of writing clean and self-documenting code.
Proficient in the fundamentals of front and back-end frameworks. (We use React and Django)
Willing to take difficult coding challenges to get things up and running quickly.
Self-motivated, with the ability to bridge multiple technical areas and work in cross-functional teams.
Strong knowledge of CS fundamentals, including data structures, OO design, and common design patterns, and performance analysis. You should be very good with Data structures.
Proficiency in at least one Object-oriented programming language such as Java, C++ or Python
Excellent communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
Preferred Qualifications
Basic Qualifications + Qualifications given below.
Experience building large-scale, fault-tolerant and distributed systems
Knowledge of software engineering best practices in all stages of the development process, including requirements, design, implementation, testing, and operational support.
Experience in database optimization and writing highly optimized code.
Ability to effectively communicate with technical and non-technical stakeholders across all levels of an organization.
In-depth experience of web development using React.js and Django.
*

Title: Web Developer
Description:
We are Looking for a Web Developer with 2+ years of professional experience. Below are the requirements :
- Bachelors Degree required in fields such as Computer Science, Engineering.
- 2+ years of professional experience
- Must be able to hand code in HTML, CSS, Javascript and frameworks such as jquery, react, vue, knockout etc
- Must have experience programming in a server side language for the web including PHP, Python, Golang, Java etc.
- Able to use a debugger to debug code problems. For PHP, any experience with xdebug is a huge plus.
- Any experience with PHP frameworks such as Laravel or CMS frameworks like WordPress is a huge plus.
- Any experience coding WordPress Themes and Plugins is a huge plus.
- Must have knowledge of version control systems such as Git and ability to write code in a distributed team setting.
- Must be able to communicate in written and verbal English with good communication skills.
- Must be able to work out of our Whitefield, Bangalore office on a daily basis. We are about 5 mins from Forum Value Mall. Note that relocation will be offered to the right candidates from outside of Bangalore but you must be willing to move to Bangalore preferably in the Whitefield area.
- Our headquarters is based out of the United States (East Coast) and some timezone overlap may be required as needed.
What you will be doing on a daily basis:
- Work on existing client requests including code changes, enhancements, bug fixes in our web applications.
- Work closely with a distributed team across Bangalore and United States (our headquarters). Engage with technical and sales/marketing team members to ensure client needs are met.
- Respond to customer support tickets and resolve issues in a timely manner. Support tickets can range anything from a simple question to code change.
- Building our client websites and web applications using various front-end and backend tools.
- Document internal processes and training materials for clients as needed.
Please apply only if you meet all of the above requirements.

Title: Sr. WordPress Developer.
Description:
About Company
Lotus Interworks Inc is an advanced technology company with leadership team form Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), Stanford University, and Harvard University. Our product Simplia is re-inventing Online Local Services Marketplaces, with deep technology and strong leadership and strategy in place.
Leadership Team: Chairman: Ray Stata Founder of Analog Devices (ADI NASDAQ), President & CEO: B Gopinath. He started as a scientist at Mathematics research center of AT&T bell laboratories. He holds several fundamental patents in communications and computer technologies. Advisor: Alain Hanover, Senior Partner Elite Engineers Fund, at Alumni Venture Group (AVG recognized by PitchBook as the most active VC firm in the world in 2018). Advisor: Bill Kerrigan, Bills career includes more than 30yrs of distinguished accomplishments, Including roles as President & CEO of Abine, Radialpoint, and as EVP of McAfee's Worldwide Consumer Business.
Responsibilities and Duties
Conceptualize, develop and maintain rich, scalable & high performing web-applications using WordPress/PHP web frameworks which are cross-browser & mobile compatible.
Extensively engage in iterative development model right from requirements gathering, development, deployment & production support.
Keep up-to-date with emerging trends and best practices around web development and relevant web frameworks.
Deliver high-quality web & mobile solutions on time.
Technically guide junior members in the team as needed..
Qualifications
Working experience in WordPress, PHP (preferably using any MVC frameworks) and MySQL.
Sound understanding of OOPS concepts.
Innovative and an excellent problem solver.
Good team player who proactively works in achieving team & company goals.
Quick learner and capable of mastering new skills efficiently.
Should possess excellent communication skills and be able to prepare technical PPT's outlining module architecture/standards, conduct demos and document repeatable tasks to facilitate knowledge transfer amongst team members & to relevant stakeholders.
Conduct unit and integration testing for the developed module.
Organize, prioritize, and handle multiple tasks/projects simultaneously.
Educational qualifications - BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, MCA or any similar relevant field.
Skills
Required skills : -
Extensive hands-on WordPress development experience.
Sound conceptual understanding of WordPress architecture, short codes, hooks and coding standards.
Extensive development experience in creating / customizing WordPress plugins / themes.
Sound PHP development experience.
MySQL.
HTML / HTML5.
CSS / CSS3.
Javascript / JQuery.
Development of rest API's and related standards.
Nice to have skills: -
Development experience using any industry standard PHP MVC frameworks such as Codeigniter / Laravel.
Bootstrap or any industry standard client-side web frameworks.
Knowledge on WordPress plugins like WooCommerce, Multi-vendor Marketplace, ShortCodes Ultimate, Ultimate Member, Bookly etc.
Knowledge on WordPress page builder Divi.
Knowledge on payment gateway integration API’s like Authorize.net, Stripe,Paypal etc.
Experience
Proven 5 - 6 years of experience developing web applications on WordPress platform.
Shift Model
Candidates should be available only for 4 mandatory hours for the scheduled shift in US timings (Open for Night Shifts), In this case Salary will be based on the productive hours spend by the employees.
Work Environment Needs
A proper and quiet work place with all necessary infrastructure is mandatory (Laptop, Headset, Desk, Chair & Power Back up)
Bandwidth Needs
Candidates should have a primary broadband connection with minimum of 30Mbps and a secondary connection which will serve as a back up, company will reimburse the amount incurred towards the broadband installation & monthly data charges borne by the employees, based on the submission of Invoice/receipt to accounts department for both primary & secondary connection.
Company Perks
Night Shift allowance as per company policy

Title: Front End Engineer
Description:
Experience with object-oriented design
2+ years of professional non-internship experience with front end, web or mobile software development using JavaScript, HTML and CSS

The Amazon Product and Customer Insights team is looking for a scale-focused and customer-obsessed web developer. Our team’s mission is to build innovative automation solutions to reduce manual effort, reduce errors and improve security standards of existing processes for the Product and Customer Insights organization. After the successful growth in 2019, we are working towards the next wave of innovation in building tools and products which provide teams access to new data sources and new capabilities to measure customer experience.

As a Front-End Engineer, you would work closely with customers, product managers, and software developers to develop front-end software, using technologies including but not limited to JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The ideal candidate exhibits a passion for customer experience and evaluates how we can improve product adoption and satisfaction. You have a track record of building interfaces which are beautiful in form, function, and simplicity. You will take direct action to improve customer experience by fixing bugs and performance issues, improving diagnostics and metrics, investigating customer-reported bugs, and listening to user feedback.

Responsibilities:
Use technology to solve difficult user interface and front-end engineering problems; all while applying the appropriate technologies, UX patterns, and best practices
Work closely with Software Engineers, Designers, and Product Managers to deliver features and new solutions to your customers
Participate in team planning, design, scoping, and prioritization discussions
Take defined software and UX designs and turn it into working code, using AngularJs and React
Develop front-end applications that are production-ready, maintainable, organized and testable
Help drive continued process improvements in development, testing, code maintenance, testing, and product performance
Help the team stay current with the rapid evolution in user experiences

MS in Computer Science or Engineering field.
Proficiency in at least one front-end languages and libraries, such as JavaScript, Node.js, React, HTML, CSS;
Proficiency in testing front-end applications and automated browser testing.
Have proven production systems based on Computer Science fundamentals such as: algorithm design, complexity analysis, data structures, distributed systems, and object-oriented design.
Experience in communicating with users, scientists, product managers, stakeholders, and other technical teams, to collect requirements, describe product features, technical designs, and product strategy.
Demonstrated passion for user experience design and improving usability.

Title: Web Developer - Bangalore, India
Description:
THE COMPANY
MPOWER's borderless loans enable students from around the world to realize their full potential by attending top universities in the U.S. Our global team is composed of ex-management consultants, financial services and technology professionals, and other experts in their respective fields. As a FinTech social enterprise startup backed by a strong roster of VC and PE firms, we move extremely fast and leverage the latest technologies, global best practices, and heavy analytics to tackle one of the biggest challenges in financial inclusion. We work hard, have fun, and believe greatly in our cause. For us, this mission is personal.
As a member of our team, you'll be challenged to think creatively in an environment where ideation and implementation happen very quickly. We value feedback and emphasize personal and professional development by providing the resources you need to further your skills and grow with the company. MPOWER is committed to cultivating your strengths and curiosity and helping you make an immediate impact.
THIS IS A FULL-TIME POSITION BASED IN OUR BANGALORE, INDIA OFFICE AND REPORTING DIRECTLY TO THE MANAGER OF ENGINEERING.
THE ROLE
You will be collaborating with various teams to build and support content management platforms using the latest technologies. You will work in a fast-paced agile environment delivering a high-quality product with a focus on continuous innovation. This includes activities such as:
Building and maintaining WordPress Sites & conducting smooth deployments bi-weekly
Evaluating designs, wireframes and other deliverables for deployment feasibility
Implementing lean, semantic, cross-browser compatible, responsive HTML5/CSS/Javascript
Installing, testing and debugging WordPress plugins
Maintaining WordPress Core updates and adjusting functionality
Conducting cross-browser and cross-device testing to ensure consistent display on browsers and in mobile
Communicating efficiently across different teams and acting as a subject matter expert for everything website-related
THE QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor's degree, or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
3+ years of building and deploying world-class websites, with a portfolio of work
Keen eye for design and user experience
Experience creating and modifying WordPress themes & Plugins
Expert HTML & Sass/CSS skills with full understanding of web standards and responsive design techniques
Strong understanding of industry trends and content management systems
Basic understanding of SEO and accessibility best practices
Understanding of CDN, caching and website speed improvement
Basic linux skills
Attention to detail, ability to match designs and collaborate and communicate with designers

Title: Wordpress Developer
Description:
About IDEX
Do you want to be part of a global movement for improving the quality of lives for people and significantly enhance your own life in the process?
Are you tired of dead-end jobs with even more “dead” (or constipated) people around yourself and you seek to make your life, your career and yourself matter?
Are you willing to be part of a team of “rebels” who, since 2003, have gone through successes, failures, mistakes and great victories to create a small but truly outstanding company that is daring to dream globally and already somewhat on its way?
If yes, then you may want to be part of our Tribe and get on the ride?
Through a journey of many ups and downs, we have created ( and are still creating) a company that has offered the very best travel experiences to people that money can buy. And in the process, have operations in 5 Asian countries (India, Thailand, Vietnam, Sri Lanka and Nepal) and have managed to create a global distribution network in 35 countries worldwide.
We have done this through creating a thriving business and following our values of always doing what is right, taking care of each other, doing more things with less and making continuous improvements.
Idex is not a place for the meek or even for those who have been brain-damaged to believe that only people formal education in some “top-notch” educational institutions can have amazing careers and worth in the world. Idex is not a place for those who are happy with the status-quo. Its only fit for those with ambitions. Ambitions for a great life for themselves and for making a difference in the world.
And while we are situated in the rather dull and boring city of Jaipur in India, our fan-base is global. And so are our ambitions.
We are committed to and making strong progress towards our 20-year goal to serve 5 million people annually and get there by continuously challenging ourselves for creating innovative service solutions, providing great value to our customers, elevating lives of our stakeholders, disrupting already existing ways of doing things and making an impact globally.
Responsibilities and Duties
Good understanding of front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery
Experience building user interfaces for websites and/or web applications
Experience designing and developing responsive design websites

Ability to understand CSS changes and their ramifications to ensure consistent style across platforms and browsers
Ability to convert comprehensive layout and wireframes into working HTML pages
Knowledge of how to interact with RESTful APIs and formats (JSON, XML)
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools {{such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial}}
Strong understanding of PHP back-end development

Title: AI UI/UX Front End Engineer
Description:
Job Title: AI UI/UX Front End Engineer
Career Level: D1
Location: Chennai

Company
AstraZeneca is a global, innovation-driven biopharmaceutical business that focuses on the discovery, development and commercialization of prescription medicines for some of the world's most serious diseases. But we're more than one of the world's leading pharmaceutical companies. At AstraZeneca, we're proud to have a unique workplace culture that inspires innovation and collaboration. Here, employees are empowered to express different perspectives and are made to feel valued, energized and rewarded for their ideas and creativity.

Role
Are you interested in building data products that could benefit millions of patients? Do you like the freedom to design and code on experimental projects?
We are assembling a new team committed to building and analysing disease knowledge graphs, comprising diverse skillsets: data scientists, engineers, bioinformaticians and with an interest in graph and natural language processing. This team will transform our ability to surface key biological insights improving our understanding of oncology, respiratory and cardiovascular disease, targets and drug response.
We are looking for an entrepreneurial Front-End Developer who is experienced in the design of web apps and can take ownership of the visual appearance of our product.
We are working in collaboration with our scientists to help develop better drugs faster, choose the right treatment for a patient and run safer clinical trials.
Our team is integrating knowledge from biomedical literature, genomics, screening and chemistry to
Discover novel drug targets.
Identify patterns defining distinct patient groups and biomarkers.
Understand drug mechanism of action and safety.
Build recommendation systems supporting decision making in drug programs.
As part of our team, you will design and build innovative web applications and data visualizations that AstraZeneca’s drug discovery scientists use to make each of these key decisions.
You will architect efficient and reusable API and front-end systems that drive complex web applications.
You will collaborate with Data Scientists, Software Engineers and Product Managers across AstraZeneca to build compelling user-facing products.
Candidate Knowledge, Skills and Experience
Essential
Independent, Creative, collaborative, & product focused
Experience coding as part of a team (including participating in PR reviews, establishing unit testing, linting and performance frameworks within CI/CD)
JavaScript experience, including concepts like asynchronous programming, closures, types, and ES6.
Coded a significant project in React before.
Experience in iterating over designs using prototyping tools such as Figma or Sketch.
HTML/CSS experience, including concepts like layout, specificity, cross browser compatibility, and accessibility
Have contributed to APIs design

Desirable
You have experience with React[PV5] [W(6] , Mithril.js, Vue.js or other front end libraries for writing reusable components
You have worked on you own as the solo front-end developer in a team.
You have experience iterating over designs with clients or users
You use redux or other libraries for state management
You have experience using typescript
You have created data visualizations (D3.js, Vega, plotly.js) and maybe even used network visualization libraries (sigma.js, linkurious.js, cytoscape.js)
You have designed or used graphQL APIs in your projects.
You have some knowledge of linux command line and/or CI/CD systems.
You have knowledge of the biological or drug discovery domain
Other
The role will have no direct line reports, but task management responsibilities within project or services may occur.
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Special Considerations
Though all of Axelerant’s roles are work from anywhere, we are India-based for salaries and work timings. Explicitly, we expect people to typically have at least a five-hour crossover with the 11 AM to 7 PM India (UTC+05:30) timezone workday.
About Axelerant
We began as an idea in 2005 to build a unique, work from anywhere professional services organization with empowering benefits for our team members. Today, we have achieved that and are continuously improving our career, feedback, performance, and recognition management programs. Further, leadership can happen by anyone, at any time from within Axelerant's team.
We're a very collaborative bunch of enthusiastic achievers who are being open about how we're doing it and kind to make people feel welcome in all that we do. So, when you're excited about learning from and helping others – you'll find a great home here.
Discover the Axelerant Difference
Axelerant is an open organization with fantastic team members and a rocking 4.8/5.0 Glassdoor rating. Our growing team of 100+ includes some of the best and brightest from around the world.
Remote & Flexible
All you need is a reliable Internet connection. Work from anywhere you're comfortable and choose work hours to balance your life.
Unique Culture
Our culture is distinctive. We do everything in our power to create an empowered and fulfilling work environment for team members.
Professional Development
We're always teaching and learning. Peer mentorship, life coaching, certifications, and training help our team members advance professionally.
International Events
We want you to attend events related to the things you care about. Get sponsored by us when you're contributing to those events.
Retreats & Meetups
With annual retreats, quarterly town halls, and monthly celebrations, we never let remote get in the way of work or fun.

52 weekends and 35 days per year of consolidated leave plus maternity, paternity, and sabbatical allowances.

Title: UX Developer
Description:
UX Developer Responsibilities
User experience (UX) is a person’s emotions and attitudes about using a particular product, system or service. It includes the practical, experiential, affective, meaningful and valuable aspects of human–computer interaction and product ownership. Additionally, it includes a person’s perceptions of system aspects such as utility, ease of use and efficiency.
User experience may be subjective in nature to the degree that it is about individual perception and thought with respect to a product or system. User experience varies dynamically, constantly modifying over time due to changing usage circumstances. Simplified, user experience is about how a user interacts with, and experiences, a product.
UX developers, also known as user experience developers, plan, design, and develop web applications and web pages using code and visual design tools. Companies that want to appeal to consumers hire UX developers to work full time, although some work for themselves as independent contractors. UX developers work independently but collaborate with the rest of the development team to design various web applications and programs.
A UI/UX developer is responsible for the website or application experience of visitors. UI/UX Developers must have a great understanding of user behavior and can be viewed as part psychologist and part web developer. Usually, good UX developers will understand how to align business/marketing goals with technology. Writing a good job description for a UI/UX developer will require you to understand the skills and responsibilities needed for the specific project and ongoing work.
UX Developer Openings
Apply for UX Developer Job Openings in Delhi
Apply Now
Front End Developer Jobs
Front End Developer Fresher Jobs
UI Developer JOB DESCRIPTION
Understand product specifications and user psychology
Conduct concept and usability testing and gather feedback
Create personas through user research and data
Define the right interaction model and evaluate its success
Develop wireframes and prototypes around customer needs
Find creative ways to solve UX problems (e.g. usability, findability)
Work with UI designers to implement attractive designs
Communicate design ideas and prototypes to developers
Keep abreast of competitor products and industry trends
UI Developer Skills
Trained or educated as a UX Designer, UI Designer or similar role
Strong portfolio of design projects
Background in project management and research
Familiarity with interaction design and information architecture
Proficient in design software (e.g. UXPin, Balsamiq)
Knowledge of HTML/CSS; JavaScript is a plus
Problem-solving aptitude
Analytical mind with a business acumen
Excellent communication skills
BSc in Design, Computer Science, Engineering or a related field
Why Us?
We are Amazing
CryptoMize is a Conglomerate Digital Agency based in India with presence in 3 Continents evolving for a decade, having served elite clients such as Governments, Politicians, MNCs, Celebrities and HNIs in 30+ Countries.
Yummy
Our awesome chef prepares freshly Maison-made breakfasts, lunches, diners, beverages, coffees everyday to provide the fuel you need to innovate.
Events and Hackathons
Want to organize, talk or attend an event? We give you two days per month to attend or organize team-buildings, conferences, trainings, meetups or hackathons.
Company Outings
Work hard, play hard! We have an in-house bar with a large choice of wines, beers and arcade games. Plus, we organize memorable & engaging team events at least twice a month.
Elitebook or Alienware
Choose your laptop, Elitebook or Alienware on your first day to get your job done. Fun fact: We didn’t find any laptop able to compute as fast as our team.
Flexible Everything
We choose to work in a flex office environment to grow new collaborative ideas and practices. We work in small product oriented teams to focus & execute faster.
No Diplomas Required
At CryptoMize, we don’t care about your degrees, we only care about what you know. Your skillset will be evaluated in regard to your technical experiences and skills.

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
The Front End Developer’s primary responsibility is to code high-performance websites for our enterprise clients. These will include websites, mobile web apps, intranets, commerce solutions, and community sites.

Assist in the development of complete solutions within realistic budget and schedule requirements.
Write code and develop engaging digital experiences.

Supports the team in writing documentation and building tools to enhance productivity.

Enhance organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests.
The Skills You’ll Need:
3+ years experience writing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience writing semantic HTML5 markup.

Title: HTML5/ WEB/ UI Designer
Description:
Experience: 4+ years
Location: Hyderabad
Position Closed
The Opportunity: Come Build the Next-Gen Hi-Tech Product Platform

Background:
In the United States, a new TV broadcasting standard has recently been ratified by the US Government's Federal Communications Commission referred to as ATSC 3.0, this new technology literally doubles the broadcaster bandwidth pipes for the same amount of spectrum utilization apart from providing the ability to deliver broadcast TV signals to mobile devices. Coinciding with the widespread network build out and adoption of 5G technologies by US Telecom operators, the new standard, is poised to revolutionize TV services, significantly alter the IoT landscape, and is also poised to impact the connected car/autonomous car automotive industry. The broadcast industry and the telecom industry are expected to unprecedented levels of cooperation and synergies across all dimensions of offering digital communications and content services to consumers.
More details of the broadcasting standard and articles describing its impact are:
https://www.digitaltrends.com/home-theater/atsc-3-0-ota-broadcast-standard-4k-dolby-atmos/
https://www.wesrch.com/electronics/paper-details/pdf-EL1NAB000XFYZ-atsc-3-0-5g-new-opportunities-enabling-the-future-of-tv#page1
https://www.atsc.org/newsletter/atsc-3-0-broadcasts-deliver-data-connected-autonomous-vehicles/
Gaian Solutions is working with some of the industry’s' largest broadcasting groups to operate a Openstack based Cloud Content Delivery Platform that leverages the best of AI, ML and Data Science technologies in monetizing content delivery services for the 3.0 ecosystem.
About the position:
As a QA engineer, you will collaborate with developers and product managers to identify unambiguous software requirements, then develop and execute strategies to get that software into customer’s hands in an efficient and high-quality fashion. You will work as part of the team to support Customer. You will interact closely with multiples business partners and proficient with the below roles and responsibilities.

Solid experienced in resolving cross-browser compatibility issues.
Deliver high quality production, animation and design at all times.

About Gaian Solutions:
Gaian Solutions is a 13-year-old product organization and a leading edge provider of products and solutions to the media and entertainment industry.

Headquarters: San Francisco/Silicon Valley, USA

R&D development centers: India and China
Gaian’s products and solutions are deployed across the globe—US, APAC, Mexico, Maldives, & India. Today, the company serves businesses as diverse as billion dollar enterprises with corporate communication needs, federal emergency warning centers with real-time alert dissemination requirements, public transport networks broadcasting live streams of information, retail chains looking for sales closures from impactful content experiences as well as entertainment service providers with a constant need to delight consumers.
Gaian is all about our people, our values and our way of doing things—intangibles that can't be measured or modeled in business terms but that truly make the difference. With close to 250 experienced software architects, consultants, project managers, software, broadcast and media engineers located worldwide our purpose is honored each time we exceed our client’s expectations, each time an employee reaches his/her goals, and each time we contribute to the society positively and make it a better place.

Title: Web Developer
Description:
The MSME sector...
Bharat has 60 Million MSMEs (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises). 90% of India’s ~$1 Trillion Retail Market is controlled by a traditional/unorganized sector. Which means ~$900B worth of commerce flows through these ~60M MSMEs in the form of shops/warehouses/kiosks/homes, scattered all over the country.
Who we are and what we do...
Khatabook aims to build products that every MSME would use to run their business better.
We started with the business ledger, which saves 3- 4 hours for merchants per day by managing their credit, creating transparency in cash flow, and increasing trust with their consumers – solving a critical need for India's MSMEs.
We also empower merchants to collect payment digitally and help build their identity through offerings such as business cards.
What have we achieved so far...
Today more than a Million merchants are uploading data and engaging with the Khatabook app daily while adding $200 Million worth of transactions every day. The high engagement has resulted in more than 25% of the total active merchants joining the platform through word-of-mouth and referrals.
Play your role in making history...
KhataBook closed a $60 Million Series B Round by top investors during the COVID pandemic. India's MSMEs also showed their trust by the continued use of Khatabook in these troubled times. The Khatabook Team is now focussed on empowering them, by building the next-gen digital-first products that...
Eases the management of capital cycles so that merchants can earn more money.
Simplifies the acquisition and distribution of goods and smoothen the payments.
Upskills merchants to run their businesses better.
Responsibilities
As a Senior Frontend React Engineer, you will be first hand responsible for designing the architecture of our Web Apps, implementing it, and making crucial technology decisions.
You will be writing high-quality, clean, performant code in React, Redux, and JSS that will stay in the company for years to come. You will inspire other developers to write good code, and maintain a culture of high-performance engineering teams with exemplary work.
In short, you will ensure our customers and engineers always have a top-notch experience with your work!
Requirement
2+ years of experience building React applications
Experience building UI/UX on a large-scale app
In-depth understanding of web browsers - performant CSS design, code execution, event handling, data security, storage, and network requests
Strong software fundamentals - data structures and algorithms
Being able to write detect edge cases and performance issues early on and fix them
Bonus points for building apps in Typescript

Description:

Job Description
We are looking for a Web Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users, as well as translating the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce the visual elements of the application. You will also design the overall architecture of the web application and evolve it to ensure maximum performance and stability. Need to cover US timings as and when required.

Responsibilities
Responsibilities
Proficient knowledge of a front-end programming language {{Depending on the specific case, a developer should have the knowledge of one or more: HTML5, CSS, PHP, Python, JavaScript (Node.js, Angular2+), jQuery, Bootstrap, Responsive Design, etc.}}
Understanding differences between multiple delivery platforms (such as mobile vs, desktop), and optimizing output to match the specific platform
Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
Data migration, transformation, and scripting
Ability to implement automated testing platforms and unit tests
Good understanding of {{Depending on the specific case, a developer should have knowledge of advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks such as AngularJS, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, ReactJS, DurandalJS etc.}}
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery {{or other frameworks such as Zepto, MooTools, etc. depending on project requirements}}
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, ability to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools {{e.g. Git, Mercurial or SVN}}
Skills
Skills/Experience
Design of the overall architecture of the web application
Implementation of a robust set of services and APIs to power the web application
Building reusable code and libraries for future use
Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability
Implementation of security and data protection
Translation of UI/UX wireframes to visual elements
Integration of the front-end and back-end aspects of the web application
Accelerate Your Career

Job Description
Software Developer Trainee (CRM/ERP)
We are looking for talented Fresher / Entry Level candidates who are interested in starting their career in Zoho, Saleforce and other CRM as a developer and who want to help our 100+ customers around the world use 10XBiZ services to transform their business with CRM and business process automation technologies.
10XBiZ not only provides you with the rewarding career development you are seeking, but also with unmatched benefits that help you get the most out of your career and your life.This position is a full-time position based out of our Hyderabad office. We are presently a small team looking for an ambitious, talented, self-starter who is passionate about working on the award-winning CRM platforms.
Key Responsibilities:
Responsible for developing, implementing, maintain custom CRM and other business applications (on Zoho Platform) —including coding, agile team principles
Working and build strong relationship with Solution Architects and Platform Architects to fit in 10XBiZ standards and guidelines to champion best practices and guide and influence team on leveraging such practices.
Taking impactful features from idea to implementation
Elegantly bring designs to life using standards-compliant dynamic HTML, CSS, and Javasript.
Brainstorm and prototype new concepts and approaches fast, turning prototypes into real things.
Work with product manager to meet the demands of our customers, while at the same time continuing to innovate far beyond the competition.
Build strong relationships across the business, that may be leveraged to produce better products and solutions. Be a team player in a highly collaborative environment.

What you need to be Successful
Highly motivated, creative, self-directed, and thrives in fast-paced, dynamic environment
Good oral and written communication skills
Team player and be able to interact with other team members to deliver fast with quality
Curiosity to expand your skills
