Title: Laravel Developer
Description:
Do you eat, drink and breath Laravel?
Is this journey for you?
Over the last 3 years, we’ve built some amazing platforms, ranging from improved care for cancer patients to automating operations of skill development non-profits, the list of applications is endless. Most of these platforms were built on Laravel.
Over the last few months, we have experienced a tremendous growth in the social and healthcare sector. The need for building meaning software for these sectors is growing and this year we’re planning to bridge the gap with more applications. Most of them will be built on Laravel.
To sum it up, we love the Laravel framework and we’re looking for one of you to join our tribe. We’re welcoming freshers who have just graduated as well as experienced professionals who can bring some fresh perspective to our team.
We guarantee an immense amount of professional and personal growth, opportunity to work and build and a competitive salary based on your skills, values and what you bring to the table.
Your itinerary
You will be required to work as a full-stack developer, capable of working on applications independently. You are the owner and the delivery in-charge of your code. To dive into the details you will be:
Developing in Laravel on the LAMP stack
Understanding the business domain and working in close proximity with the clients to discuss requirements and deliver end to end results
Building
custom software, developing on both clientside and serverside.
integrations with 3rd party tools and services
unit tests for your modules
Owning the maintenance of cloud infrastructure for your applications.
Working collaboratively in a healthy environment of learning and knowledge sharing
Evolve as a professional
Apart from work, we expect you to read, write and grow as a software developer. Watch Laracasts over Netflix at night and hog on these books:
Pragmatic Programmer, by Andy Hunt and Dave Thomas
Passionate Programmer, by Chad Fowler
Code Complete 2, by Steve McConnell
Version Control by Example, by Eric Sink
If you like the above-mentioned list, go for these as well.
The Goal, by Eliyahu M. Goldratt
Eat that Frog, by Brian Tracy
What you need to begin your journey
We expect graduates to be adept at the basics.
Languages – PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL
Learning new technologies and frameworks
Object – Oriented Programming, MVC architecture
Concepts – Databases, SDLC, data structures.
If you’ve gained certain experience in the field we expect you to have a holistic knowledge of Laravel and PHP ecosystem :
Frameworks and libraries
Back-end programming: Laravel 5.6, WordPress, CodeIgniter
Front-end programming: ECMAScript 2016, SASS/LESS, Bootstrap3/4
Tools – Git, Github, SublimeText/VSCode, NPM, Composer, Grunt/Gulp, Browser DevTools, Linux shell
Concepts – Version Control, Design Patterns, Continuous Integration and Testing frameworks in Laravel, performance optimization, programming standards and best practices.
Infrastructure: Amazon Web Services like EC2, S3, Route 53, RDS, ELB; Web servers (Apache or Nginx), REST APIs

Title: Angular Developer
Description:
We are looking for developers who will either be responsible to develop a new website or maintain old web applications built in Angular JS and Angular 2+. Candidates must possess good understanding and knowledge of TypeScript and observables.
Roles & Responsibilities

Tasks & Activities
Requirement Gathering from Business/Stakeholders
Discussion with the client/business team to understand their requirement(s).
Ask relevant questions to clarify the business requirements.
If needed, document the business rules.
Estimations & Task Planning
Divide the project into modules and tasks based on the business requirement or SRS.
Estimate time for the modules/tasks based on different estimation techniques.
Prepare a project plan and WBS which will have each module and tasks with specific start and end date.
Seek approval from all the stakeholders on WBS and prepare the project plan accordingly.
You should be well-versed with the project management tool.
Database creation & updating custom modules
Identify the modules/tasks and prepare the database designs using MySQL Workbench.
Discuss the same with the team members and seek approval from the stakeholders.
Coding, Debugging, Unit Testing & Documentation of Code and Application
As per the best standard practices and guidelines, code each module within the timeline mentioned in WBS.
Debug and unit test the code/module.
Use appropriate versioning tools like GIT, SVN, etc.
Document the code and application that later can be shared with the client.
Prepare the user manuals for custom module/code which needs to be shared with the client and used for training purposes as well.
Optimize the website after checking through benchmarking tools like www.gtmetrix.com or Google Page Speed.
Experience in the latest Angular version.
Good knowledge of Service-based architecture/Component-based architecture.
Project Deployment & Maintenance
Check all the deployment checklist before putting anything on production.
Update the security patches whenever those are available.
Mandatory Skills & Knowledge
Minimum 2 years of development experience in Angular and TypeScript.
Good understanding and experience of HTML / CSS / Javascript / Webpack / Bootstrap.
Hands-on experience with ES6 / ES7 / ES8 features.
Expertise with Web Services / REST APIs.
Proficiency in Linux and deployment on Linux.
Skilful experience in Node JS / Express / MongoDB will be a plus.
Knowledge of AWS services like S3, EC2 would be valuable.
Expertise in Agile and CI/CD would be beneficial.
Technologies / Frameworks / Tools / Proficiency
Languages/Frameworks: TypeScript, Angular 2+, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS.
Database: MongoDB, SQLite.
Tools: Git, Visual Studio Code / WebStorm.
Operating System: Ubuntu / CentOS.
What's in it for you?
Opportunity to grow and scale high with us.
Work in a fun, transparent atmosphere alongside a collaborative team.
Support from the senior staff for your growth.
Competitive salary with added benefits.

Title: Senior Developer
Description:
*
Full Stack: Python | Django | Javascript | React
*
*
7+ years of software experience. 2+ years of experience in relevant technologies
*
*
Full time, remote.
*
*
Generous holidays. Competitive salary.
*
We are looking for full-stack Javascript and/or Python web developers, to extend and improve our appointment scheduling software that is used by tens of thousands of businesses around the world.
*
We are looking for generalists who can take ownership over code and product. You must care about product and features, right from inception until they are in the hands of our users. You will be willing to take feedback from our users about what works and what does not, and to act on this to make our product even better.
*
*
We offer an environment where we all have clear responsibilities and empowerment with actual power. We work closely as a team, while also respecting the time and space that people need to get their work done. We care and talk about our culture, and are always looking to improve ourselves as a team and individually.
*
*
Responsibilities can include...
Developing new features to improve our product, in response to user feedback and testing.
Developing UIs and UXs using Javascript and React, either extending our existing micro-apps or developing new ones from scratch.
Developing internal APIs to support our frontends, so that they are fast and scale efficiently with the business.
Developing core infrastructure using Python and Django, including generating new database schemas and writing queries using the Django ORM.
Debugging Python or Javascript to triage and fix bugs.
Profiling Python or Javascript to ensure that our product is responsive for users and able to scale with demand.
Deploying code and developing infrastructure to support the monitoring and maintenance of a system that is used 24/7.
*
*
Other information
Our appointment scheduling software keeps businesses and their customers on the same page, to make bookings happen.
*
*
We have lots of plans for improving our product. Whether it’s using AI to identify customers who might be late for their bookings and personalising messages to them, extending our communications system to support Whatsapp and voice calls, or supporting enterprises who use our APIs to integrate with their own systems - there is lots of exciting work to be done.
*
*
Our 15 person team works remotely, with staff from around the world. For us, working as a team is a vital part of how we operate. Join us, and you'll find:
We work together and remotely because that’s how we’ve found we work best.
Culture is important to us and we’re always trying to maintain and improve it.
We work as a team and tackle our challenges together.
We’re flexible: we adjust to our employees’ individual requirements to make sure they are happy and productive.
*
*
We will onboard you with our existing micro-apps, codebase and documentation. You will be supported and trained in the technologies we use, and we will want you to bring your own experience and expertise to help improve the team.
*
Benefits:
Work from home opportunities
Flexible working hours

Salary: ₹700,000.00 to ₹1,500,000.00 /year
Experience:
total work: 7 years (Required)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Title: Remote Full Stack Developer
Description:
Important Note: This is a full time remote role. The applicant can work from anywhere. We're an Australia based org. with a global development team. You'll get the chance to work on cutting edge products using the best tools with a great team with flexible hours.
Who we are
Uprise is a full-spectrum Mental Health tech start-up that builds both preventative & treatment solutions. Our system allows early detection of people who are at risk and then acts immediately to provide proven skills via smart-phone to kick-start recovery. We also link them with a phone coach who contacts them weekly until they are back on track. We are backed by 10 years of research and have over 13 published research studies showing that we can help a majority of our users return to good mental health using a low-cost web-based early intervention process that requires only 25 minutes per week for the user.
Responsibilities
Here's what you'll do:
Build out product features in JavaScript using React.js, in a flux architecture with redux.
Contribute to the GraphQL API that powers our app.
Frequently commit code to github, peer review code, and merge code into Staging and Production environments.
Contribute to our Design system by developing functional react components.
Create beautiful frontend UIs using styled components
Learn the ins and outs of startup culture and weekly sprint lifecycles using Agile methodologies
Suggest new technologies that can improve the Uprise development workflow.
Here's what we can offer:
INR 6,00,000-7,50,000/year in salary (depending on experience)
Opportunity to work remotely
A modern day work flow
Single push deployments
A great, vibrant, positive team
Flexible hours
A product that makes this world a better place
The Ideal Candidate profile
Passionate about coding, and constantly improving their skill set.
Excellent communication skills
Minimum of 1 year of professional experience with react.js, redux, node.js, graphQL.
Familiarity or some sort of interest in the following: github, microservices, web app security
Able to work on a time schedule which overlaps with with AEST (GMT +10:00) for at least a couple of hours every day
Job Types: Full-time, Contract
Salary: ₹600,000.00 - ₹750,000.00 per year
Experience:
Node.JS: 1 year (Required)
React.JS: 1 year (Required)
Work Remotely:
Yes

Title: Sr. Node.js Developer
Description:
About Company
Lotus Interworks Inc is an advanced technology company with leadership team form Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), Stanford University, and Harvard University. Our product Simplia is re-inventing Online Local Services Marketplaces, with deep technology and strong leadership and strategy in place.
Leadership Team: Chairman: Ray Stata Founder of Analog Devices (ADI NASDAQ), President & CEO: B Gopinath. He started as a scientist at Mathematics research center of AT&T bell laboratories. He holds several fundamental patents in communications and computer technologies. Advisor: Alain Hanover, Senior Partner Elite Engineers Fund, at Alumni Venture Group (AVG recognized by PitchBook as the most active VC firm in the world in 2018). Advisor: Bill Kerrigan, Bills career includes more than 30yrs of distinguished accomplishments, Including roles as President & CEO of Abine, Radialpoint, and as EVP of McAfee's Worldwide Consumer Business.
Responsibilities and Duties
Architect, develop and maintain high performing & scalable cloud hosted microservices using Node.js frameworks which are highly responsive to requests from front-end.
Extensively engage in iterative development model right from requirement analysis, estimation, development, testing & production support.
Dedicated to deliver high-quality web & mobile server-side solutions on time.
Conduct code reviews to ensure code meets industry accepted standards. Additionally, ensuring that application is not vulnerable to web security threats.
Break down development work into manageable and measurable pieces of work.
Technically guide peer members in the team as needed.
Qualifications
Extensive working experience in Node.js and MySQL.
Innovative and an excellent problem solver.
Good team player who proactively works in achieving team & company goals.
Quick learner and capable of mastering new skills efficiently.
Should possess excellent communication & interpersonal skills and be able to prepare technical PPT's outlining module architecture/standards, conduct demos and document repeatable tasks to facilitate knowledge transfer amongst team members & to relevant stakeholders.
Create unit, integration & automated tests for any developed module/server-side application logic.
Organize, prioritize, and handle multiple tasks/projects simultaneously.
Educational qualifications - BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, MCA or any similar relevant field.
Skills
Required skills : -
Extensive hands-on Node.js development experience.
Expertise in object-oriented JavaScript.
Deep understanding of design principles behind building high performing & scalable web applications.
Basic understanding of front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS & frameworks preferably vue.js.
Sound knowledge in database design, creating & fine-tuning complex queries preferably using MySQL.
Design and develop elegant rest web services that conforms to rest standards.
Nice to have skills : -
Experience with cloud provider preferably Amazon.
Knowledge on code versioning tools preferably GIT.
Knowledge on CI/CD pipeline development preferably using Jenkins.
Experience in third party systems integration.
Experience
Proven 5 - 6 years experience developing server-side applications using Node.js.
Shift Model
Candidates should be available only for 4 mandatory hours for the scheduled shift in US timings (Open for Night Shifts), In this case Salary will be based on the productive hours spend by the employees.
Work Environment Needs
A proper and quiet work place with all necessary infrastructure is mandatory (Laptop, Headset, Desk, Chair & Power Back up)
Bandwidth Needs
Candidates should have a primary broadband connection with minimum of 30Mbps and a secondary connection which will serve as a back up, company will reimburse the amount incurred towards the broadband installation & monthly data charges borne by the employees, based on the submission of Invoice/receipt to accounts department for both primary & secondary connection.
Company Perks
Night Shift allowance as per company policy

Title: Sr AWS Developer
Description:
HP is the world’s leading personal systems and printing company, we create technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere. Our innovation springs from a team of individuals, each collaborating and contributing their own perspectives, knowledge, and experience to advance the way the world works and lives.
We are looking for visionaries, like you, who are ready to make a purposeful impact on the way the world works.
At HP, the future is yours to create!
If you are our AWS Developer in India, you will have a chance to
Manage complete SDLC cycle from requirements gathering to product/feature deployment in production for our cloud solutions.
Establish best development practices and emerging concepts like server less architecture, Lambda, NoSQL, Angular 5, Typescript with high efficiency and effectiveness.
Set up complete software development environment using DevOps practice in cloud.
Ensure highly secure, bug free and high performance software products and features as per requirements. Owner of releasing bug free software into production.
Be responsible hands-on coding with unit test cases and updating it when needed.
Responsible for writing all requirement document, use cases and acceptance criteria.
Solve complex development problems / constraints using latest available tools and technologies in cloud environments. Ability to communicate solutions convincingly to the team and other stakeholders.
Review and influence of existing solution, design and system architecture.
Act as a subject matter expert on various development methodology (TDD, UDD, etc..), specific tools used for them, market trends and best practices
Are you a high-performer? We are looking for an individual with:
Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field with 8 to 10 years of overall experience in software development.
3+ years of experience as AWS and Angular.
Expertise in architecting and design software solutions.
Experience in complete SDLC, Agile Scrum, DevOps and Automation of testing including practices like Test Driven development, Domain Driven development, Behavior Driven development, etc.
Experience in working with cross cultural and geographically distributed teams.
Self-development skills to keep up to date with fast-changing trends
A strong focus on business outcomes
Experience in End to End software development; requirement elicitation, design and developing software on AWS.
Skills
Strong in UI technologies with HTML5, Angular 8+, Typescript, NodeJs, MongoDB, Lymdas
Strong with serverless architecture with AWS Lambda, AWS API GW, AWS DynmoDB, JavaScript, Node, and YAML
Strong Experience in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable software that leverages AWS core services. (e.g. compute, network, storage, database, management, etc…)
Good hands-on experience in Java, JavaScript, Typescript and/or C#
Good knowledge of security as it relates to an AWS infrastructure
Experience with configuration management tools (e.g. GitHub, TFS, etc…)
Experience in one or more of the following: Web service: soap, xml, wsdl, rest api.
Should have good working experience on web service implementation and multi-threaded application development.
Understanding of Microsoft Technologies and the printing domain is desirable. Should be ready to learn it and adapt quickly.
Need to have excellent thinking and a quick learner as per project needs. Should be self-motivated and a self-starter.
Should have excellent problem-solving skills with good logical and analytical skills.
Should be highly quality conscious and focus on-time delivery. Needs to be a team player.
Familiarity with Unix/Linux operating systems and networking concepts
Experience in executing Agile SCRUM projects with tools like TFS, JIRA etc,
Experience in executing CI/CD processes in on-premises and AWS environments is desirable

Title: ASP.NET C# SQL Developer/Team Lead (4-6 year experience) at...
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Ownership, of the deliverable for the software product "Probench" that we work on and making sure the code quality is up to the internal standard.
Leading team with design discussion and task assignments to coordinate between other managers.
Reviewing Code and providing correction, optimal solutions that are writing by the developers and junior programmer.
Good communication skills so that you can be part of our international client meetings and discussions to later explain it to the team and get the work done.
Writing code for complex and performance-related challenges to the clients.
Coaching team members with best coding practices and applying TDD and Design Principles.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Being the technology lead for the team
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Good with TSQL
Excellent communication skills
Willing to learn XSLT
Willing to learn Angular
Knowing Angular and NodeJs is added advantage
Benefits
5 days work week
10% coaching time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with only International Clients
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be coordinating with Clients requirements, Design Discussions with teams. Making sure the Test Driven Development is being implemented and the continuous Integration servers running with 100% results
You will also lead the development side in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code or think to anticipate good design in a product.
Your job will include coaching to team members and learning better leadership skills and improve the development process in place.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. As a leadership role, you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software and 5+ years in the Product Probench to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
How many team members will you lead?
There will be a total of 5 team members you will be leading 2 of them has 2 years of experience and 3 of them has 6 months of experience.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Who we are: Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 286 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.
We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom.

Title: Full Stack JavaScript Engineer
Description:
PayPal UI Engineering is seeking Full Stack Web Application / UI Engineer to join the Design System team to help continuously build, and make our library of web components. You will work closely with designers and other developers to provide technical guidance and deliver accessible, robust components PayPal uses in web applications across all business domains. Quality is at the forefront of everything our team does, and we are looking for true passion for writing robust, re-usable, scalable and well-tested code.
Our ideal candidate :
Is experienced with building highly-interactive applications using React.js/Agular js
Deeply understands the JavaScript language, including modern APIs and syntax (ES6+)
Has a robust understanding of HTML and CSS core concepts and best practices
Has API and library design experience—you know how to build software that other engineers can use successfully. You care about the overall developer experience and are careful to make the right way of using the system the easiest way.
Understanding of managing and publishing releases using Git branching and tools like npm and Yarn.
Demonstrated awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues and client-side performance.
Is knowledgeable about a wide range of web and internet technologies
Brings creativity to their work and designs resilient, scalable, and maintainable software
Has experience using JavaScript build tools like Gulp, Webpack or Rollup
Experienced with design systems, likes of Google material design, Salesforce Lightning design system, and Shopify Polaris
Has functional knowledge of inclusive design: accessibility, and related tooling
Has Experience creating accessible components, including knowledge of ARIA and WCAG conformance.
Has strong communication skills. You can work with engineers, designers, product managers, and engineering managers to prioritize work and identify opportunities that will benefit multiple teams.
Responsibilities:
You will work in a fast-paced environment where continuous innovation and experimentations are a given, your responsibilities will include:
Build and maintain our component and styles library
Help evolve the frontend infrastructure and architecture
Construct performant and accessible components, ensuring that our library complies with best practices.
Collaborate with design, research, and product to build an elegant and performant UX
Work closely with front-end engineers across multiple products and teams, advocating for system adoption, coordinating and collaborating on design decisions and standard methodologies
Requirements:
Proficient in client & server-side MVC JavaScript frameworks like React.js / AngularJS, State management via Redux, HTML5, CSS3. CSS frameworks like Bootstrap / Zurb.
Experience in developing automated unit and functional tests
Experience in an Agile development process
Solid knowledge of algorithms and design patterns
Have a passion for quality and writing clean, readable code that scales and performs well
Good interpersonal communication skills
6+ years of software design and web application development
BS or equivalent degree in Computer Science
Job_Description_Summary: PayPal Design System team is a cross-functional team of people dedicated to enabling world-class, cross-product experiences through design. We create resources and guidelines to craft PayPal visual language that developers and designers use to build accessible, consistent, performant and engaging user experiences. PayPal UI Engineering team is seeking a Full-stack Javascript engineer in Bangalore to work on our next generation Design System platform to build the frontend libraries for our visual language.
Who we are: Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 286 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.
We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom.
PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities.

Educational Qualifications
BSCS or equivalent + 7 years of experience / MSCS + 5 years of experience in software development
Job_Description_Summary: PayPal Consumer Web team builds the user experiences used by millions of users across the globe. We’re looking for strong JavaScript/React/Node skills and solid real-world experience. You will need to be able to architect & build solutions to problems with little guidance from others. We want candidates with a vision for how to empower developers. You should be familiar with the latest tools & practices popular in the community. We hope you’re passionate about these tools and can help us make decisions about which ones will work best for PayPal. We’re looking for leaders to help move the company forward. The candidate should have great communication skills and ideally past experience working with a distributed team. People will look up to you on this team, so experience mentoring and teaching would be helpful. At PayPal we ship code to millions of users all over the globe. This position is an opportunity to have a high impact across many teams at PayPal and help us accomplish our goal of democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy.
Who we are: Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 286 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.
We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom.
PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities.

Title: Software Development Engineer III (Fullstack)- Wadogo
Description:
Who are we and What do we do?
We help advertisers reach and engage with their target audience globally. We do this through a deep understanding of people, which is enabled through our algorithms that respect privacy. Today, some of the world's largest brands, agencies, developers, and publishers are creating great value by using our platforms to deliver a compelling proposition to their target consumers.

Currently, we provide over 1 billion mobile users with relevant advertisements that enable meaningful decisions. We display 8 billion advertisements on a daily basis. That's 1 advertisement for every individual in the world - And we're working on taking this number to more than 1 for every individual that's ever walked the earth!
What's the InMobi family like?
We are an infectious bunch. Be it the way we rise up to challenges, the cutting edge products we create, the dreams we chase or the fun we have at work. We are sure that if you meet us, you will be infected too. Today, we are proud to be the leaders in Mobile advertising and we are sure to go even higher from here. We invite you to free yourself, dream big and chase your passion. We are here today because a few of us did just that.
What can we promise?
We offer an opportunity to have immediate impact with the company and our products. Modern work environment, flexible schedule and smart, creative, down-to-earth people. Internal opportunities to move roles and try out bridge assignments with different teams. Food for your soul – free meals all days of the week, gym or Yoga class to flex those biceps, cocktails at drink cart Thursdays and fun at work on Funky Fridays. We even promise to let you bring your kids and pets to work.
What is the team like?
InMobi performance marketing team is responsible for delivering KPI and ROI for performance advertisers by leveraging multiple channels such as Affiliates, OEM partners, Social and Influencers.
InMobi affiliate platform is a massively scalable enterprise software built on Azure cloud. This platform is used by internal and external marketing specialists to manage, track, analyse and optimise online advertising campaigns in real-time. Here is an exciting opportunity to work on the problems related to highly scalable, low latency enterprise cloud platform processing billing of events/day, several TBs of data and running several ML/DS models.
What will you be doing?
Responsible for implementation of product and its feature/component with the highest quality with specific directions and guidance.
Constantly driving innovations in development with framework building mindset .
Ability to estimate scope, task effort and communicate progress and risks.
Collaborates with development teams and help identify and drive building reusable platforms/libraries, using iterative development practices.
Writing code that ensures monitoring, metric dashboards, runbooks, logging, escalations, and alerts.
Support and contribute to ongoing improvements and efficiencies in operational practices, tools & processes across InMobi.
Involved/hands-on in design, code reviews, technical issues.
Participate in technical forums and make learning relevant technologies a continuous habit.
What do we expect from you?
4+ years of experience in building web applications using JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3
Experience in working with any server side technologies
Sound knowledge of any client side MV frameworks such as React, Angular, Backbone + Marionette, Node.Js
Experience in working on microservice applications using Java, Spring
Experience with Databases such as MySQL, Redis, NO SQL
Experience in building RESTful web services
Familiar with operating and maintaining cloud / physical infrastructure
Experience in end-to-end product building with an experimental mindset.
Knowledge of Design Patterns is a must
Good knowledge of using SVGs to build complex graphs
Experience with unit tests, integration tests, continuous integration systems (such as Jekins/Travis), deployment and operations automation

Company Introduction
Richken Media is a young and vibrant start-up Information Technology firm based in Trivandrum, Kerala, India. We maintain a pool of amazing people who are experts in specific technologies and hence can drive the business needs of our clients. Our resources deliver on every fragment of needs that our client makes, this in a nutshell is the predictability we offer.

We are looking for a Senior Back-End Web Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Title: QA Engineer/ Drupal Developer
Description:
Contribute to or support aspects of planning, design, development and delivery of system solutions for a specific business or technology area, in alignment with design and architectural standards and business requirements. Capture, qualify and help prioritize new IT demand and ensure IT services provided to business are meeting service quality standards as per agreed SLAs.

-Represent IT to the business or IT groups receiving services, ensuring that expectations for IT services are met. -Identify and qualify new demand and assist with steering proposals through the early phases of approval; help establish budgets and investment proposals and obtain sponsorship and funding. -Ensure the introduction of new / modified services happens in a planned, controlled and timely manner to minimize disruption and maximize benefit. -Create the detailed IT solution/service design, based on functional specifications, to meet quality and performance requirements and technical constraints. -Develop, build, configure, customize, and unit test solutions based on the functional and technical specifications to meet quality and performance requirements. -Work to integrate services horizontally across organizational units, and manage interfaces between Service Delivery projects. • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases • Develop, build, configure and unit test solutions from low level designs • Ensure that solutions meet requirements outlined in the design documentation • Perform all work to agreed time, cost and quality constraints • Ensure that developed solutions are peer reviewed and formally documented • Unit test solutions to ensure they meet quality standards • Develop within an Agile SDLC framework, including; estimation, design, development, unit test, code reviews, and documentation • Ensure delivered solutions satisfy business requirements as outlined in user stories, and within agreed upon timelines • Ensure solutions are of high-quality with regards to following standards and best practices, as well as satisfying security and performance requirements • Collaborate effectively with Agile team members to ensure a high-performance team environment • Work with Production Support team in the research and resolution of production issues.

- -Completeness and accuracy of business demand capture -Project/solution delivery execution (quality, time, cost) -Process efficiency -IT service risks recorded / managed -Customer Satisfaction -Service/solution quality: timely and accurate reporting (i.e. Service performance and CSAT analyze) -Adherence to solution architecture and architecture roadmaps -Adherence to SLAs

Digital & Technology Savvy Organizational Savvy Project Excellence Continuous Learning (Dyn. Knowledge Development) Managing Change Interpersonal Savvy Being resilient
Minimum requirements
Collaborating across boundaries Cross Cultural Experience Organization Scope; Scale and Complexity Ambiguity Accountability English IT Data Analysis IT Systems Design Programming / Software development IT Systems Integration IT Service Level Management Consulting Supplier Relationship Management.

Education: Bachelor’s degree in business/technical area adequate equivalent Exp • At least 5 years of experience in Web technologies. • At least 2 years of experience in software quality assurance • At least 1 year Drupal development experience • Strong organizational, interpersonal and communication (verbal and written) skills • Ability to build strong relationships and communicate with a breadth and variety of internal and external resources. • Ability to work with others in a high paced, fluid, multi-cultural and multi-disciplinary team • Ability to operate in a global organization • Serve as a Subject Matter Expert and thought leader • Management of resources (time/budget/people) within defined time parameters • Regular and close engagement with all stakeholders • Ensure that all Drupal products are developed to the same high standards in terms of time, cost and quality constraints Language • Must be able to fluently read, write, understand and communicate in English.

Job Purpose • Responsible for the creation and execution of tests to identify issues with software before the product launch to ensure the completed products meet Alcon’s high quality standards. • Develop, build, configure, customize, integrate and unit test Drupal solutions on Acquia Cloud Site Factory based on the functional and technical specifications which meet quality and performance requirements. • Collaborate with multiple stakeholders.

• Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes • Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases • Previous Drupal development experience required • HTML, JavaScript, CSS, PHP, and Drupal 8 development experience preferred • Acquia Cloud experience preferred • Acquia Cloud Site Factory experience preferred • Drupal certification is a bonus • Scrum or Agile methodology experience • Experience on Cloudflare,JIRA,Bitbucket,GitHub and Travis CI

Title: Senior Product Developer
Description:
Role Overview:
Signant Health innovates at the leading-edge of clinical research data, one exceptional service at a time. From the advanced technology of our eCOA electronic Clinical Outcomes Assessments flexible platform, to the efficiency of our scalable and configurable Randomization and Trial Supply Management (RTSM) Clinical IRT solution, to our science-focused Rater Training and Quality Assurance programs, Signant does it faster, better and with an eye on the future of our industry.

If you’re looking for a growing company with delighted customers, a dedication to superb products designed with the patient in mind, and a management team that allows you to make your mark on how the company evolves, we want to hear from you.

We are:
A company that offers a unique suite of solutions, with a unique perspective on clinical research development
Focused on bringing together best-in-class science, technology and service to drive superior clinical outcome results for our clients and for their patients
At the leading-edge of clinical research data, one exceptional service at a time
Experienced and have implemented over 250 studies in more than 80 countries
A company that takes great care to maintain our culture and ensure that each new team member enhances that culture
You are:
Ready to work in an inspiring team environment with an open communication culture
Creative and innovative
A detail-oriented problem solver who delights in adding value to products and their roadmap
Eager to stay abreast of emerging new software technologies, frameworks, and libraries, and identify where these could improve existing or new projects
Able to design, develop, and maintain front-end systems and back-end systems
Providing technical input to project-related decisions
Ready to use unit testing, integration testing, code coverage, and other tools to ensure correctness of software.
Drawn to Development because you like contributing to solid, well-made products
Eager to use your skills in a company with products that helps people
Key Accountabilities/Decision Making & Influence:
We are seeking an exceptional candidate to lead and produce software for our team.

This role will require an experienced Senior Product Developer ready to play a key part in our software development efforts, interfacing directly with the engineering, product testing and product management teams to ensure superb-quality development and deployments of software enhancements. As a Senior Product Developer, you will learn our innovative software suite from the inside out. You will grow both technically and increase your product knowledge. At a medium sized company, you will see the impact of your work daily as part of our rapid release schedule.

We pride ourselves on the quality of our systems and our ability to evolve products to anticipate client needs. As a Senior Product Developer, you’ll combine organizational skills, familiarity with software development, and a keen detail orientation to help ensure we settle for nothing less than the highest standards.

As a Senior Product Developer you will be contributing to team and software development needs:
Be a part of the day to day activities of a team of Product Developers
Work with a vertical area of one or more products
Help drive the successful completion of development projects
Ability to learn and apply new skills, procedures, and approaches
Create technical design documentation
Evaluate and implement new technologies into the current development process
Takes active participation in technical training and mentoring for junior team members and cross functional teams
Knowledge, Skills & Attributes:
Required Skills/Experience
Six+ years’ experience professionally developing software
Experience with some or all of the following technologies:
Microsoft SQL Server or other relational databases including stored procedures, views and triggers
Microsoft Visual Studio, C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core
Node.js, JavaScript, AJAX, CSS, XML, XSLT
Web page design, Angular, React
Object Relational Mapping (OR/M), MVC, MEF, Unity Framework
Team Foundation Server, BitBucket, Git, Subversion or other source control product
Knowledge of the various services and capabilities of cloud computing platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP)
Understanding of cloud computing design and security principles
An understanding of CI/CD processes and tools like Jenkins or Bamboo is desirable
Knowledge of Docker containers and related orchestration technologies is desirable
Cloud Certifications a plus
Has analytical and conceptual skills, with a curious mind for troubleshooting and building software
Detail-orientation with the ability to understand how each aspect interacts with the big picture
An understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and programming fundamentals
Oral and written communication skills and an ability to work with technical and non-technical staff
A single-minded focus on deadlines and deliverables
Understanding of Agile methodologies
Fluency in English, both written and verbal
B.Tech/M.Tech in any engineering preferably Computer science or MCA

Title: Frontend Engineer - React.JS | Falabella | 1-3 years
Description:
About the Job
Falabella is one of Latin America’s leading integrated retailers with 560+ stores across 7 countries comprising department stores, home improvement, supermarkets, real estate, financial services, and travel. The specialist India team delivers IT business solutions to the Falabella Group. Join a group of passionate and driven individuals who are not just accelerating digital transformation in eCommerce, but also have the opportunity to shape their career.
We are looking for a JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. You will focus on developing user interfaces in React.js web environments, which interact with our users in a stable, intuitive and safe way. You will ensure these components are robust and easy to maintain. Connected with an existing data system that will be part of a new platform that is being developed for our various Ecommerce sites. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the platform and infrastructure, hence collaborative problem solving and quality product is very important.
Role & Responsibilities
Developing new use-facing features using React.js
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
Support the developments until they are installed in production
Propose improvements in the solutions and tools
Apply the principles of design and architecture defined by the company
Refactoring of the existing components in the platform, according to the needs of the business
Ensuring design & implementation is efficient and high performance
Implement the automatic tests associated with the frontend layer, both integration and unit
Develop extensible and scalable solutions that could be used by other teams

Title: Java Developer

Spunk and Glam is a fast-growing remote staffing organization catering to small and medium scale American companies in the east coast along with our overseas partner Staffing Global. We have been empowering business owners to focus on their core business activities by deploying seamless service delivery in the areas of accounting, Finance, Software development, technological and operational support functions. Our virtual infrastructure, best practices and proven process knowledge helps deliver a full suite of outsourced services, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, bookkeeping, financial reporting and controller level services, software development, graphic design, order management and customer service to our valued clientele in the US. Presently we are calling out to ambitious professionals who aspire to be game changers in the domain of software development. We are recruiting Full stack Java Developers to essentially play an engaging role with our client.

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.
As a global business, Refinitiv relies on diversity of culture and thought to deliver on our goals. Therefore we seek hardworking, qualified employees in all our operations around the world-regardless of race, color, sex/gender, including pregnancy, gender identity and expression, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, marital status, citizen status, veteran status, or any other protected classification under country or local law. Refinitiv is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer providing a drug-free workplace.

Title: .Net/Drupal Senior Developer
Description:
Contribute to or support aspects of planning, design, development and delivery of system solutions for a specific business or technology area, in alignment with design and architectural standards and business requirements. Capture, qualify and help prioritize new IT demand and ensure IT services provided to business are meeting service quality standards as per agreed SLAs.

-Represent IT to the business or IT groups receiving services, ensuring that expectations for IT services are met. -Identify and qualify new demand and assist with steering proposals through the early phases of approval; help establish budgets and investment proposals and obtain sponsorship and funding. -Ensure the introduction of new / modified services happens in a planned, controlled and timely manner to minimize disruption and maximize benefit. -Create the detailed IT solution/service design, based on functional specifications, to meet quality and performance requirements and technical constraints. -Develop, build, configure, customize, and unit test solutions based on the functional and technical specifications to meet quality and performance requirements. -Work to integrate services horizontally across organizational units, and manage interfaces between Service Delivery projects. • Develop, build, configure and unit test solutions from low level designs • Ensure that solutions meet requirements outlined in the design documentation • Perform all work to agreed time, cost and quality constraints • Ensure that developed solutions are peer reviewed and formally documented • Unit test solutions to ensure they meet quality standards • Develop within an Agile SDLC framework, including; estimation, design, development, unit test, code reviews, and documentation • Ensure delivered solutions satisfy business requirements as outlined in user stories, and within agreed upon timelines • Ensure solutions are of high-quality with regards to following standards and best practices, as well as satisfying security and performance requirements • Collaborate effectively with Agile team members to ensure a high-performance team environment • Work with Production Support team in the research and resolution of production issues.

- -Completeness and accuracy of business demand capture -Project/solution delivery execution (quality, time, cost) -Process efficiency -IT service risks recorded / managed -Customer Satisfaction -Service/solution quality: timely and accurate reporting (i.e. Service performance and CSAT analyze) -Adherence to solution architecture and architecture roadmaps -Adherence to SLAs.

Digital & Technology Savvy Organizational Savvy Project Excellence Continuous Learning (Dyn. Knowledge Development) Managing Change Interpersonal Savvy Being resilient
Minimum requirements
Collaborating across boundaries Cross Cultural Experience Organization Scope; Scale and Complexity Ambiguity Accountability English IT Data Analysis IT Systems Design Programming / Software development IT Systems Integration IT Service Level Management Consulting Supplier Relationship Management.

Education: Bachelor’s degree in business/technical area adequate equivalent Exp: • At least 5 years of experience in Web technologies. • At least 3 years Drupal development experience • Strong organizational, interpersonal and communication (verbal and written) skills • Ability to build strong relationships and communicate with a breadth and variety of internal and external resources. • Ability to work with others in a high paced, fluid, multi-cultural and multi-disciplinary team • Ability to operate in a global organization • Serve as a Subject Matter Expert and thought leader • Management of resources (time/budget/people) within defined time parameters • Regular and close engagement with all stakeholders • Ensure that all Drupal products are developed to the same high standards in terms of time, cost and quality constraints • Ability to operate in a global organization Language Must be able to fluently read, write, understand and communicate in English..

Job Purpose Develop, build, configure, customize, integrate and unit test solutions based on the functional and technical specifications to meet quality and performance requirements • Provide Drupal development expertise to Agile team in the definition, design, development, and implementation of Acquia Drupal solutions in Acquia Cloud Site Factory. • Provide Microsoft .Net development expertise to Agile team in the migration, maintenance and support of .Net websites.

Specific Job Posting Content • Previous Drupal development experience • HTML, JavaScript, CSS, PHP, and Drupal 8 development experience required • Acquia Cloud experience required • Acquia Cloud Site Factory experience strongly preferred • Drupal certification is a bonus • Microsoft .Net development experience required • Microsoft Certified Professional Developer Certification prefered • Scrum or Agile methodology experience • Experience on Cloudflare, JIRA, Bitbucket, GitHub, and Travis CI

Description:
Izenda is seeking a Front-end Developer/Designer with a strong design mind to help drive our customer-facing application design and UI strategy. ).
Reporting into the development organization, the Front-End Developer/Designer is responsible for detailed application design, hands-on development and maintenance of the front-end of our application, our marketing experiences (as needed), and client-side application developer. Title: Identity & Access Mgt Administrator
Description:
Contribute to or support aspects of planning, design, development and delivery of system solutions for a specific business or technology area, in alignment with design and architectural standards and business requirements. Capture, qualify and help prioritize new IT demand and ensure IT services provided to business are meeting service quality standards as per agreed SLAs.

-Represent IT to the business or IT groups receiving services, ensuring that expectations for IT services are met. -Identify and qualify new demand and assist with steering proposals through the early phases of approval; help establish budgets and investment proposals and obtain sponsorship and funding. -Ensure the introduction of new / modified services happens in a planned, controlled and timely manner to minimize disruption and maximize benefit. -Create the detailed IT solution/service design, based on functional specifications, to meet quality and performance requirements and technical constraints. -Develop, build, configure, customize, and unit test solutions based on the functional and technical specifications to meet quality and performance requirements. -Work to integrate services horizontally across organizational units, and manage interfaces between Service Delivery projects. • Design, implement and maintain infrastructure for development / testing environment • Help to drive architectural improvements and standardization for the infrastructure environments, including choice of networking infrastructure, hardware, monitoring software and associated application infrastructure (e.g. web servers, application servers, and database servers) • Develop and enhance automated processes to release new solutions into the live environment • Accountable to ensure adherence with Security and Compliance policies and procedures within Engineering service scope • Identify, evaluate and participate in the design and engineering around new and emerging technologies. • Serve as the subject matter expert for Saviynt Identity Governance, Okta for SSO/MFA and ThycoticPrivilege Access Management tools and includes installation and configuration, performance tuning, backup and recovery methods in multiple computing environments. • Help to drive architectural improvements and standardization for the infrastructure environments, including choice of networking infrastructure, hardware, monitoring software and associated application infrastructure (e.g. web servers, application servers, and database servers) • Support the overall direction to the IAM functions across the organization, including areas such as Federation, Privileged Access Management, Authentication & Authorization, Security and Provisioning Identity Data.

- -Completeness and accuracy of business demand capture -Project/solution delivery execution (quality, time, cost) -Process efficiency -IT service risks recorded / managed -Customer Satisfaction -Service/solution quality: timely and accurate reporting (i.e. Service performance and CSAT analyze) -Adherence to solution architecture and architecture roadmaps -Adherence to SLAs.

Digital & Technology Savvy Organizational Savvy Project Excellence Continuous Learning (Dyn. Knowledge Development) Managing Change Interpersonal Savvy Being resilient.
Minimum requirements
Collaborating across boundaries Cross Cultural Experience Organization Scope; Scale and Complexity Ambiguity Accountability English IT Data Analysis IT Systems Design Programming / Software development IT Systems Integration IT Service Level Management Consulting Supplier Relationship Management.

• Education: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent years of applicable experience o Preferred certification - Okta Administration Certification, CIAM, CISSP, CISM • Experience: 5 – 10 years of applicable experience o Identity Governance and Administration – 2 years of direct experience at an engineering or architectural level. Prefer experience in Saviynt at an Architect or Developer level with 2 years supporting, designing and creating complex workflows. o Privilege Access Management – 3 years of engineering or architectural design level o Federated Identity principles –2-5 years of engineering or architectural design level around Federation (OAuth 2.0, SAML 2.0, Single Sign On (SSO), Multifactor Authentication (MFA), Service Provider, SP, IdP, understanding AWS and Azure Cloud integrations) The ability to fluently read, write, understand and communicate in English. • Identity Governance and Administration – direct experience at an engineering or architectural level.

Title: Executive Assistant
Description:
We are looking for an organized and resourceful assistant to help with our administrative and operational tasks. You should be actively invested in building and improving communication processes, business processes, and overall workflows.
Ideally you’re looking for a long-term partnership where we both grow and thrive together for years to come
Job Role
Receiving and replying to all client enquiries via email and phone.
Tracking payments, building and maintaining a client database.
Coordinating between different departments. You must collect files from our nutritionist and ensure that the formatting is as per company brand standards. The file must then be combined with the exercise plan and sent to the client.
Client progress follow-up every 3-months, after which a new set of plans need to be emailed.
Handling and responding to all online communication generated through our website.
Feedback and customer care: Set standard procedures and practices to communicate with clients. Engage with them and take their feedback.
Build a strong team by hiring customer care executives, nutritionists and other roles that may be required as the company grows
Coordinating with the web developer when required for website maintenance, updates or issues.
Coordinating with the content production, social media marketing and digital marketing teams.
Requirements
First and foremost, you should be an efficient problem solver who is always looking to learn more.
You should be a native-level English writer and speaker with a knack for catching (and keeping) people’s attention.
You should be highly proficient with MS-Office, GSuite and or other office management softwares.
A keen interest in technology is very important for the progress of the company. You should know your way around the internet and learn new tools and techniques that can help us grow faster.
Familiarity with online products/ courses is a must, but you don’t have to be an expert.
Must have 1-2 years prior experience in administration and management, creation of SOPs.
Logistics
You will work from Mon-Friday, between the times of 9am and 6pm Indian Standard Time, as this is when we will collaborate most often.
You must be open to regular communication and consistent updates and availability.

Bachelor's (Preferred)

Title: Salesforce Developer
Description:
Our professionals balance analytical skills, deep market insight and independence to deliver solid, defensible analysis and practical advice to our clients. As an organization, we think globally. We create transparency in an opaque world, and we encourage our people to do the same. That means when you take your place on our team, you’ll discover a supportive and collaborative work environment that empowers you to excel. If you’re ready to share your perspective with the world, then you can make a real impact here. This is the Duff & Phelps difference.
At Duff & Phelps, your work will help protect, restore and maximize value for our clients. Join us and together we’ll maximize the value of your career.
Position Overview
Our Compliance Risk and Diligence practice needs a Salesforce.com Developer who is good at Apex, Visualforce and full SFDC project implementations, all in the ever-increasingly demand of a global business in the 21st century.
You’ll need to be self-motivated, a great communicator and deeply technical across the full stack. You’ll be working with the other developer and software QA teams in Hyderabad, and key stakeholders in USA, United Kingdom, India, Hong Kong, and elsewhere throughout the world.
As a team, we value integrity, honesty, consistency, and teamwork. We utilize modern best practices while respecting that legacy portions of the application are different.
Responsibilities:
Be a developer on certain projects and enhancements of high-complexity.
Develop an understanding of how the application works and how it is used.
Need a sense of how a feature “should” work without explicit requirements.
Convert functional specifications into technical solutions with minimal guidance.
Develop integration processes with external systems using APIs and web services including third-party integration tools.
Review code for potential performance, security, or reusability issues.
Review code to ensure that it meets the requirements, or of you see a “better way”.
Interact with the project owner, key stakeholders, QA, and other developers as needed.
Desire for self-improvement, both manager-led and self-identified.
Provide support to end users.
Troubleshoot and fix production issues.
Requirements:
Bachelors/Master’s Degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
4+ years of experience in developing Salesforce platform using Apex, Visualforce, Triggers, Custom Controllers, Batch Apex and writing test classes.
Good knowledge of OOPS
Experience in tasks like User Creations, Roles, Profiles, Page Layouts, Email Services, Workflows, Validation rules, Custom objects/settings, reports and dashboards.
Strong knowledge in Salesforce.com standard functionality, features and Force.com Capabilities
Hands on experience in implementing Salesforce communities.
Develop custom code using Visualforce, APEX to build customized solutions, debugging skills and supporting business initiatives/processes.
Experience in Lightning, migration from Salesforce classic to Lightning would be preferable
Familiar with Deployment options like Change Sets, Force.com IDE
Experience in Apex Data loader for data load activities or familiar in related tools.
Knowledge in UI front ends with HTML, JavaScript and CSS/Bootstrap, experience in jQuery will be a plus
Ability to learn new things quickly and to understand the client's requirements
Knowledge with REST/ SOAP based web services and their integration with salesforce platform and SSO setup
Good understanding of Security Concepts, Governor limits & Best Practices on Force.com.
Strong analytical, problem solving, and troubleshooting skills
Nice to have:
Salesforce Platform Developer I or II (PDII – added advantage)
Working experience on versioning tools like SVN/GitHub, etc
Experience in Sales Cloud, Service Cloud
Knowledge on GoJS library
Experience on FusionCharts library or similar related to Data Visualization tools
In order to be considered for a position at Duff & Phelps, you must formally apply via careers.duffandphelps.jobs

Duff & Phelps is committed to equal opportunity and diversity, and recruits people based on merit.
